Trade/Device Name(s): Gold Standard Diagnostics Borrelia burgdorferi VlsE-OspC IgG/IgM ELISA Test Kit
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Gold Standard Diagnostics Borrelia burgdorferi VlsE-OspC IgG/IgM ELISA Test Kit for detection of Lyme disease antibodies in human serum
Indications for Use Summary: For qualitative detection of IgG and IgM class antibodies to Borrelia burgdorferi VlsE and OspC antigens in human serum from symptomatic patients or those suspected of having Lyme disease, as part of first-tier testing in standard or modified two-tier methodologies.
